projects.title: Event Management System
projects.description: An event management system implemented in C++ to manage event creation, participant registration, check-ins, scheduling, and reporting, using data structures like trees, queues, and stacks.

projects.title: Computer-Based Testing Application
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. This project is a Computer-Based Testing (CBT) Application implemented in C++, designed to facilitate user authentication (as students or administrators), administer multiple-choice tests, and manage user registrations. It includes features such as question skipping, score calculation, and script review, making it a comprehensive platform for educational assessments.

projects.title: PayVantage Dashboard
projects.description: Developed an interactive Power BI dashboard during my internship at PayVantage to visualize and analyze key metrics, including completed transactions, successful transactions, network performance, and response rates, providing actionable insights for the company's daily operations.
